Everything for [HerBy Alexa Riley]68-alexa riley [I]0-i ’ll never forget the way [she]193-her looked , so confident and sure of [herself]193-her . [I]0-i watched [her]193-her from a distance . [She]193-her was n’t ready for [me]0-i yet . [I]0-i did n’t approach [her]193-her and [I]0-i did n’t disturb [her]193-her , but [I]0-i never once took [my]0-i eyes off [her]193-her . [Mallory Sullivan]69-mallory sullivan is ready to start [her]69-mallory sullivan new life . After graduating at the top of [her]69-mallory sullivan class , [she]69-mallory sullivan ’s landed one of the most coveted internships in [the United States]194-the united states . Hard work and determination have gotten [her]69-mallory sullivan to this moment of living the life [she]69-mallory sullivan only dreamed of while growing up in [foster care]195-foster care . From the start , [I]0-i knew that [she]69-mallory sullivan would be [my]0-i greatest achievement , so the day [I]0-i let [her]69-mallory sullivan go , [I]0-i set down a path for [her]69-mallory sullivan . A path to [me]0-i . [She]69-mallory sullivan never expected [Oz]70-oz to be the greatest culmination of those dreams . But sometimes fate determines who [you]196-you fall in love with . Who makes [you]196-you lose control . Who owns [your]196-you soul . And then [you]196-you realize it was n’t fate at all ... [I]0-i ’ve wanted to care for and protect [her]69-mallory sullivan since the first moment [I]0-i saw [her]69-mallory sullivan . [I]0-i ’ve constructed everything in [our]197-our lives so that at the perfect moment , [I]0-i could have [her]69-mallory sullivan , could give [her]69-mallory sullivan the life [she]69-mallory sullivan deserves . The time has come . 99,132 words

[Dear Reader]198-dear reader , Happy New Year ! [I]0-i looked back at some of [my]0-i Dear Reader letters from past Januarys going back six years , and it looks like in many years [I]0-i ’ve reiterated [our]197-our commitment to bringing [you]196-you great books , memorable stories and [excellent authors]199-excellent authors . It ’s always tempting to try and one - up the year before , with things like “ buy [our]197-our books and ... watch [us]197-our swallow fire ! ”[200-a reader] and “ ... [we]197-our ’ll bungee jump off [the tallest building in [the world]2436-the world]2435-the tallest building in the world ! ”[200-a reader] But the truth is , since [I]0-i ’m [a reader]200-a reader at heart , [I]0-i know the only promise [I]0-i want from [a publisher]201-a publisher is to not try and trick [me]0-i with misleading genre labeling and to keep giving [me]0-i the stories [I]0-i want to read . So that ’s what [the Carina Press team]202-the carina press team will continue to work to do for [you]196-you , [[our]197-our readers]203-our readers , in 2017 . Sorry , [we]197-our ’ll have to save the fire swallowing for another year ( and the bungee jumping for never ) . Authorâ€ ™ s Note [We]266-we wrote Everything for [Her]253-her based on what [we]266-we admire most in romance . Obsession , seduction , love and lots of steam . [We]266-we hope [you]250-you enjoy [our]266-we first full - length novel and get lost in the story of [Mallory]95-miles and [Oz]70-oz . Bottoms up !

Preface Miles

[I]0-i ’ve watched [her]95-miles since the beginning . It ’s funny , but [I]0-i do n’t really remember much before [her]95-miles . It ’s as if [I]0-i could split [my]0-i life into two halves . Before [her]95-miles and after . [I]0-i remember [my]0-i life with [[my]0-i parents]270-my parents , and [I]0-i remember getting into college , but it ’s all gray before [her]95-miles . Until the day [I]0-i saw [her]95-miles , there was no color . But once [my]0-i eyes landed on [her]95-miles for the first time , it was like when [Dorothy]102-dorothy landed in [Oz]70-oz and [she]102-dorothy opened the door . [The world]2436-the world went Technicolor , and [she]95-miles was [my]0-i very own [Glinda the Good Witch]103-glinda the good witch . [I]0-i was twenty - two years old the first time [I]0-i saw [her]95-miles . [She]95-miles was seventeen and competing in a state - level high school math competition . [Yale University]18-yale university asked [me]0-i to represent [them]18-yale university as [a student judge]272-a student judge , and [I]0-i nearly declined . [The state of]273-the state of [Connecticut]19-connecticut is small but houses [one of the greatest [Ivy League colleges in [the country]276-the country]275-ivy league colleges in the country]274-one of the greatest ivy league colleges in the country . One that makes becoming a standout almost impossible . [I]0-i was among the top 1 percent in [my]0-i class as [a senior at [Yale]20-yale]277-a senior at yale , with a major in statistics . The only reason [I]0-i ’d accepted the invitation was to play a part . [Many]278-many expected [me]0-i to follow in the footsteps of [[my]0-i father]279-my father , and [I]0-i wanted [them]278-many to believe that , but [my]0-i end goal was a little different than [anyone]280-anyone knew . [I]0-i was on the path of revenge , but playing a part would help [me]0-i on that path . Rubbing shoulders with [the same men [[my]0-i father]279-my father did]281-the same men my father did , even if it left a bitter taste in [my]0-i mouth . Agreeing to judge the competition was life - changing . The bitter taste in [my]0-i mouth altered that day . A sweetness took over . [I]0-i wanted it . Needed it . [I]0-i ’ll never forget the way [she]283-her looked , so confident and sure of [herself]283-her . [I]0-i watched [her]283-her from a distance , like [you]284-you would a lioness in [the wild]285-the wild . [I]0-i did n’t approach [her]283-her and [I]0-i did n’t disturb [her]283-her , but [I]0-i never once took [my]0-i eyes off [her]283-her . [I]0-i found out later [she]283-her was being sponsored by [[her]283-her high school]286-her high school so that [she]283-her could attend the competition . [She]283-her had [no family]287-no family and was being raised in [a group foster home]288-a group foster home , so [[her]283-her school]289-her school funded the trip . [She]283-her was smart , and [they]290-they wanted to see [her]283-her succeed , which [she]283-her did . [I]0-i saw so much in [her]283-her as [she]283-her competed . [She]283-her knew all the answers and was absolutely sure each time . [She]283-her trusted [her]283-her instincts , and [they]290-they did n’t let [her]283-her down . There was so much potential in [her]283-her just waiting to be unleashed . [I]0-i wanted to sit down and have [her]283-her tell [me]0-i everything , anything , as long as [she]283-her talked to [me]0-i . [She]283-her swept the competition and won first place in [[her]283-her division]291-her division . [I]0-i was strangely proud of [her]283-her . When [she]283-her walked out of [the hotel ballroom]292-the hotel ballroom after the competition was over , [I]0-i let [her]283-her go . It was the hardest thing [I]0-i ’d ever had to do . But [I]0-i knew that if [I]0-i went after [her]283-her too soon , or too fast , [she]283-her would run . Not only was [she]283-her too young for [me]0-i , but something about [her]283-her told [me]0-i [she]283-her was [the kind of woman who came along once in ten thousand lifetimes]293-the kind of woman who came along once in ten thousand lifetimes . This was n’t to be rushed . It was to be savored . [I]0-i may hate [[my]0-i father]279-my father , but [I]0-i ’ve learned from [his]279-my father mistakes . [I]0-i ’m going to use those mistakes for [my]0-i own advantage . [He]279-my father ’s smart but sloppy at the same time and it ’s been showing . But [I]0-i know if [you]295-you want something , [you]295-you work hard for it , plan out all the details to make it yours . From the beginning , [I]0-i knew that [she]283-her would be [my]0-i greatest achievement , so the day [I]0-i let [her]283-her go , [I]0-i set down a path for [her]283-her . A path to [me]0-i . Introducing the Carina Press Romance Promise ! [The Carina Press team]202-the carina press team all have one thing in common : [we]2391-we are [romance readers]2410-romance readers with a longtime love of the genre . And [we]2391-we know what [readers]222-readers are looking for in a romance : a guarantee of a happily - ever - after ( HEA ) or happy - for - now ( HFN ) . With that in mind , [we]2391-we ’re initiating the Carina Press Romance Promise . When [you]2393-you see a book tagged with these words in [our]2391-we cover copy / book description , [we]2391-we ’re making [you]2393-you , [the reader]2412-the reader , a very important promise : This book contains a romance central to the plot and ends in an HEA or HFN . Simple , right ? But so important , [we]2391-we know ! Look for the Carina Press Romance Promise and one - click with confidence that [we]2391-we understand what ’s at the heart of the romance genre ! Look for this line in Carina Press book descriptions : One - click with confidence . This title is part of the [Carina Press Romance Promise]61-carina press romance promise : all the romance [you]2393-you ’re looking for with an HEA / HFN . It ’s a promise ! Find out more at CarinaPress.com/RomancePromise . Find out more at [CarinaPress.com]62-carinapress.com .
